channel.title: CVE Feed for Implem Inc. -- Pleasanter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Implem Inc. -- Pleasanter

item.title: CVE-2023-34439|2024-08-02T16:10:07.263Z -- implem%20inc. -- pleasanter
item.description: Pleasanter 1.3.47.0 and earlier contains a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the user's web browser.

item.title: CVE-2023-30758|2024-08-02T14:37:15.215Z -- implem%20inc. -- pleasanter
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Pleasanter 1.3.38.1 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2024-21584|2024-06-04T17:38:11.416Z -- implem%20inc. -- pleasanter
item.description: Pleasanter 1.3.49.0 and earlier contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If an attacker tricks the user to access the product with a specially crafted URL and perform a specific operation, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.

item.title: CVE-2024-21584|2024-08-01T22:27:34.812Z -- implem%20inc. -- pleasanter
item.description: Pleasanter 1.3.49.0 and earlier contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If an attacker tricks the user to access the product with a specially crafted URL and perform a specific operation, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.
